com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui
Interface OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoginActivity
Enclosing class:
OAuthWebviewHelper
public static interface OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents

the host activity/fragment should pass in an implementation of this interface so that it can notify it of things it needs to do as part of the oauth process.

Method Summary
 void finish()
          we're in some end state and requesting that the host activity be finished/closed.
 void loadingLoginPage(java.lang.String loginUrl)
          we're starting to load this login page into the webview
 void onAccountAuthenticatorResult(Bundle authResult)
          We've completed the auth process and here's the resulting Authentication Result bundle to return to the Authenticator
 void onIndeterminateProgress(boolean show)
          We're doing something that takes some unknown amount of time
 void onLoadingProgress(int totalProgress)
          progress update of loading the webview, totalProgress will go from 0..10000 (you can pass this directly to the activity progressbar)
